company.tagline: Go to market with unique data—and the ability to act on it
company.description: Clay provides creative tools to help businesses grow by combining 1st-party data, intent data, and 3rd-party data from multiple sources for deep customer research. With Clay, teams can reach their best-fit customers without significant investments in tooling or manual labor, allowing even individuals to spearhead growth campaigns effectively.
company.target_customers: Companies seeking to improve their go-to-market strategies and data enrichment capabilities

funding_rounds.source: Clay Series C announcement. The GTM engineering era begins now.

events.title: Announcing Sculpt: Clay’s first annual user conference
events.description: Join us for Sculpt, Clay’s first annual user conference on Sept 17 in San Francisco where GTM leaders build AI workflows, share creative tactics, and get early access to new features.

events.title: Announcing Web Intent
events.description: Use Website Intent in Clay to see which companies visit your site, track engagement, and trigger personalized GTM plays.

events.title: Introducing Bulk Enrichment
events.description: Clay’s Bulk Enrichment lets Enterprise teams enrich millions of Salesforce records with firmographics, tech stack data, and AI research at scale.

events.title: Introducing Claygent Navigator
events.description: A new Claygent model that can use a browser to take actions and extract information from webpages.

events.title: Announcing the Clay Partner Program
events.description: The Clay Partner Program provides essential resources to partners to help them grow their business alongside Clay.

events.title: Introducing GPT-5 in Claygent
events.description: GPT-5 is now a model option across Clay, enhancing research and conversational writing for GTM workflows.

events.title: Clay Series C announcement
events.description: Clay raised a $100M Series C at a $3.1B valuation to power GTM engineering!

events.title: Claygent surpasses 1 billion runs
events.description: Claygent, the AI research agent for GTM, has surpassed a milestone of 1 billion runs.

events.title: Clay announces employee tender offer led by Sequoia
events.description: Clay allows employees to sell vested shares through a $20M tender offer at a $1.5B valuation, with 10x revenue growth in 2022-2023.

events.title: Create personalized presentations at scale with Clay and Google Slides
events.description: Clay’s Google Slides integration enables automated personalized sales decks for various needs.

funding_rounds.source: Clay Series C announcement. The GTM engineering era begins now.
